children.title: How do I place an order?
children.content:
Browse the site and pick out a frame. Or better yet, several frames! After you choose Fill in your prescription and tell us what lenses and coatings you would like. Weâ€™ll take care of the rest!

We have a full tutorial on how to shop at EyeBuyDirect as well!

children.title: Where can I get my prescription?
children.content: You will get your prescription from your eye care professional, likely an optician or optometrist, following an eye exam.

children.title: Can I track my order?
children.content: You sure can! Enter your order or tracking number in the Track Order section in our top navigation, or you can check on the status of your order on our Order Tracking page.

children.title: How long do I have to wait for my glasses after I have ordered them?
children.content: The anticiaption is half the fun! Your order will be delivered within 7 - 14 business days.
